name: Earthquake Impact Estimation Application
description: A web application (Application) designed for quick assessment of the earthquake impact on buildings based on user-provided information.
text: Supported by: Assistant professor Hamid F Ghatte, Antalya bilim University
welcomeDescription: The program has three main steps:
objectives: Collecting the basic information about the building
Evaluation of seismic performance during the possible earthquake
Presenting a Three-dimensional (3D) models of the building and possible failure mechanisms

steps.title: Location Using Google Earth for finding the Area and initial measurements
steps.description: Introduce the application and request access to the user's location for tailored earthquake impact estimation.
steps.info: if you want to change the spot you can drag it and move it wherever you want.

functionalities.name: Location-based Data Retrieval
functionalities.description: Automatically adjust form options and default values based on the user's location, such as soil type and earthquake risk level.

functionalities.description: Present the user with a series of form steps, dynamically adjusting subsequent options based on previous inputs.
